ygData.subject: Re: Welcome Linolas and I need Money!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I ever thot of making human char b4, thou their stats sux and have no infravision, but they can pump up their INT further via artifact, which will not
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I ever thot of making human char b4, thou their stats sux and have
no infravision, but they can pump up their INT further via artifact, which
will not lose out too much. Plus the fact that they lvl pretty fast.
Maybe it's time for me to make a human caster and ask Kellendil to make
all INT rings, earrings and brac for me and see if can power play abit,
hehe.

Erudite caster life can be damn hard in the begining, esp when they r still
in their town. But at later stage, their high INT make them one of the
better casters ard. Btw, I dun think any caster on this list is putting
stats point like I did when creating char (I put pump my STR to 75!). But
even at 75 STR, I can get overload very fast. How u guys cope with this
problem? (ok I admit I loot everything to sell, no choice lah, poor mah).

Zil

wrote:
